==Future versions==
==Future versions==

[[Image:WordPad on Windows 7.png|thumb|WordPad in [[Windows 7]]]]
The version of WordPad included in the [[Development of Windows 7#Milestone 3|Windows 7 Milestone 3]] (build 6780) release shows a revamped interface with an [[Microsoft Office 2007|Office 2007]]-style [[ribbon (computing)|ribbon]] that replaces the application menu and toolbars. This revamping of the user interface has also been applied to other bundled Windows applications such as [[Paint (software)|Paint]].<ref>[http://uxevangelist.blogspot.com/2008/09/windows-7-m3-build-6780-new-wordpad-ui.html Windows 7 M3 Build 6780: The New WordPad UI!]</ref>
The version of WordPad included in the [[Development of Windows 7#Milestone 3|Windows 7 Milestone 3]] (build 6780) release shows a revamped interface with an [[Microsoft Office 2007|Office 2007]]-style [[ribbon (computing)|ribbon]] that replaces the application menu and toolbars. This revamping of the user interface has also been applied to other bundled Windows applications such as [[Paint (software)|Paint]].<ref>[http://uxevangelist.blogspot.com/2008/09/windows-7-m3-build-6780-new-wordpad-ui.html Windows 7 M3 Build 6780: The New WordPad UI!]</ref>
